comments:

If it helps any, I just counted and this error was logged 14 times, which is one
less than the number of letters in my JSP file: "This is a test."
Phil, can you please test most recent I-build? 
I couldn't reproduce, exactly, but when I tried against
'head', I got other NPE's ... related to annotation hover, or 
something .... so ... something's not right. 
Phil, I was finally able to reproduce this on 10/7 build. 
I started with fresh workspace, imported no preferences. 
created dynamic web project (created target server during its creation), 
then promptly created a JSP right after the web creation was done. 
(once, for example, I opened the web.xml editor first, and did not 
get the error when later created a JSP). 

So, not sure if its "time related", or "order related" ... but there's something 
there. Please see if you can narrow down.

Mass transfer from pa to dw. Needs more triage.
